answers.answer: A code cell contains coded data only readable by the computer
answers.feedback: No, At first it may be hard to decipher but code cells contain precise instructions to the computer in readable format.

answers.answer: A code cell contains 1 or more lines of computer code directing the computer to manipulate and display data
